name: Sons of Providence
description: This mod tells a tale of two brothers, and their mission to take them all down.

options.name: Institute
options.tooltip: Mission 1: Assault the Institute for Human Betterment

options.name: Moscow
options.tooltip: Mission 3: Frame the FSB section chief

options.name: Tower
options.tooltip: Mission 10: Take down the comms tower

english.DESC_DARTMOOR: 47 and I attacked the Institute for Human Betterment but were repelled. 47 is buying time for my escape.
english.DESC_DUBAI: I've learned that Eugene Cobb is a member of Providence. It's time to begin taking them all down, starting with Eugene Cobb, who holds one of two keys needed to open the Providence archive.
english.DESC_SIBERIA: I've convinced Viktor Novikov to give me the Secrets of the Global Elites document in exchange for eliminating the FSB Section Chief Nicholai Kamarov. I'm heading to Moscow to FSB headquarters now.
english.DESC_MARRAKESH: I've tracked the Providence Herald for the Ether Biotech Corporation, Hajun, to the Ether parking garage in Johannesburg. Hajun holds the other key needed to open the Providence archive.
english.DESC_NEWYORK: Heading to the Providence Archive at the Milton-Fitzpatrick bank in New York City with both Providence Archive keys, I plan to leave with all of Providence's secrets.
english.DESC_SAPIENZA: After learning that Thomas Cross, CEO of Cross Holdings, is an operative of Providence, and tasking 47 to take out his son, Jordan, I'm travelling to New York City to capture Thomas Cross at his son's funeral.
english.DESC_COLORADO: I am conferring with my militia lieutenants to ensure that our plans are going smoothly.
english.DESC_MUMBAI: 47 is taking out some of my best lieutenants. I need to retrieve the memory wiping antidote from Ether Headquarters in Johannesburg and convince him to remember.
english.DESC_SGAIL: 47 has eliminated the Washington sisters and stashed the Kill Switch. I need to retrieve it and capture the Constant.
english.DESC_BERLIN: I need to capture the communications center for Madame Carlisle's estate house to help 47 eliminate Madame Carlisle and capture information about the Constant.
english.DESC_HOK_TEST: I am Lucas Grey.My target is Haru Takahashi.The Nabazov Virus rages.I shall prepare.
english.char_sonsofprovidence_hero_poncho_m_desc: A rain proof poncho for maritime infiltration.
english.ui_starting_location_mumbai_ether_lab_de: Roof of Ether Headquarters, Johannesburg, South Africa
I have landed on the roof of Ether Headquarters
english.ui_starting_location_dartmoor_institute_: The Institute for Human Betterment, Brasov, Romania
47 and I have returned to the Institute for Human Betterment after our last mission.
english.ui_starting_location_siberia_moscow_desc: I have infiltrated the perimeter of the FSB Headquarters in Moscow.
english.ui_starting_location_dubai_airplane_defa: Eugene Cobb's private jet, Pacific Ocean
english.ui_starting_location_dubai_airplane_desc: I am on a flight with Eugene Cobb on his private jet.
english.ui_starting_location_marrakesh_courtyard: Outside Ether Headquarters, Johannesburg, South Africa
I've made my way to Johannesburg, and have positioned myself near Ether's Headquarters building.
english.ui_starting_location_sapienza_apartment_: Hotel Room, New York City, USA
I've rented a room overlooking the courtyard helipad near the church.
english.ui_starting_location_berlin_road_desc: I've made my way to the communications tower for Madame Carlisle's security detail.
english.ui_starting_location_newyork_garage_defa: Garage of Milton-Fitzpatrick Bank, New York, USA
english.ui_starting_location_newyork_garage_desc: I've infiltrated the garage at the Milton-Fitzpatrick Bank.
